title: Foundations of Competency-Based Platform Design for E-Learning Industry Workforce Management

context.additional_context: Foundational training for competency-based platform design to address customized workforce management demands in the Fourth Industrial Revolution era

learning_goals: Learners can describe three or more core job competencies required in the e-learning industry
Job-matching scenarios can be developed using a competency-based platform design framework
Human resource management solutions applicable in constrained technological environments (smartphone-based) can be proposed

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
